title: Unable to purchase RP?
body: I've tried repairing my client, restarting and refreshing but I still cant get it to load :(

replies.body:
Have you tried resetting your internet settings, and then setting the security level as low as possible?

Also, try closing Spotify and Skype. They might just be using all the bandwidth.

Same thing is happening to me i just want to go to NA
{{item:3070}}
Yeah, I'm having the same problem.
